inclusion.criterion: No permeation of surrounding fat planes
inclusion.label: met
inclusion.evidence: Computed Tomography of the abdomen with contrast shows the presence of a distended appendix with thickened appendiceal wall without perforation, abscess or gangrene.

inclusion.criterion: No encasement of major vascular structures
inclusion.label: met
inclusion.evidence: Computed Tomography of the abdomen with contrast shows the presence of a distended appendix with thickened appendiceal wall without perforation, absess or gangrene.

inclusion.criterion: No distant metastases or peritoneal infiltration
inclusion.label: met
inclusion.evidence: Computed Tomography of the abdomen with contrast shows the presence of a distended appendix with thickened appendiceal wall without perforation, absess or gangrene.

inclusion.criterion: Only operable cases of right colon cancer by (CT scan criteria)
inclusion.label: unknown

exclusion.criterion: Patients undergoing colectomy including another part of the colon than right colon
exclusion.label: unknown

notes: The patient is a candidate for laparoscopic appendectomy under general anesthesia.
